sect1.title: Remove Unecessary Files
sect1.para: Well we have this system finished, we can make it smaller by removing files that are not necessary for our build. On this page we remove the bloat from our build.
Now lets create a backup of our build:
Lets remove the files we don't need anymore:

screen.userinput: FILES="`ls ${CLFS}-final/lib/*.a ${CLFS}-final/usr/lib/*.a`" for file in $FILES; do rm -fv $file done
